SRC.name: Overwater Private Island Butler Honeymoon Bungalow
SRC.description: T6d8,These gorgeous overwater bungalows, located just off the resort's private island, convey an intimate connection to the Caribbean Sea and deliver complete immersion of the fine turquoise waters and rich marine life below. Glass vision floor panels and lit water ensure you can enjoy undersea views at any time. Couples can also admire the beauty of the ocean from their private outdoor Tranquility Soaking Tub for two or over-water hammocks. Every bungalow captures the height of luxury with hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings, custom crafted king-size beds adorned with soft linens and plush pillows for the ultimate sleep experience. Inside, each bungalow is also equipped with a smart TV and a large ceiling fan to stay cool while enjoying fresh Caribbean breezes. The bathrooms are equipped with his and hers sinks, a large backlit mirror adorned with mosaic tile, and a walk-in rain shower. Outside, your private patio is also equipped with an extended sun deck, outdoor shower, sun loungers, and a bistro set for two. Butler Elite service, which handles every detail of your vacation with unobtrusive grace, 24 hour in-room dining, and a private water taxi to take you to and from the mainland are all included to complete your over-water vacation. Bungalow guests will also receive the following additional inclusions: Exclusive in-room dining and room service menu. Direct resort access via a "Royal Duffy" luxury boat. Personal airport greeting. Expedited immigration. Welcome gift, including branded tote and flip-flops. Molton Brown bathroom amenities. SRC.description: T67e,These breathtaking overwater villas, located just off the resort's private island, convey an unmatched connection to the Caribbean Sea. The interior invites endless relaxation with custom-crafted furnishings, a king-size bed, and large HD Smart TV. The luxurious bathroom is equipped with backlit mirrors, a modern shower and recessed lighting. A selection of Robert Mondavi varietal wines and a refrigerator continually stocked with bottled water, juice, soda, and local beer completes this true luxury experience.

SRC.name: Crystal Lagoon Honeymoon One Bedroom Butler Suite
SRC.description: Exceedingly romantic, these Butler Suites sit above the resort's Crystal Lagoon pool. A spacious living room with a flat screen television, plush sofas and cozy chairs offer the comforts of home; while a handcrafted king-size bed adorned with fine linens, a fully stocked bar and the service of a personal butler grant supreme luxury. The spacious bathroom features a double vanity with a marble counter top, a large whirlpool tub, and a walk-in shower. These lavish escapes features an expansive balcony where you can enjoy private meals served by your personal butler. 24-hour in-room dining is included.

SRC.name: Beachfront One-Bedroom Skypool Butler Suite w/Rooftop Terrace
SRC.description:
Welcome to the top of it all. Set on the top floor of the Balmoral building, this one-bedroom Butler Suite puts you right above the beach in front of sweeping views of the Caribbean Sea. Dip into your private Skypool while the ocean breeze keeps you refreshed. Inside, natural light pours into your spacious living area, complete with a Smart TV, dining space, and a plush king-size bed. The bathroom Spa-worthy, with a soaking tub, walk-in shower, and double vanity. Save the rooftop terrace for evenings - it's designed for moonlit soaks in the outdoor tub and quiet moments under the stars that feel miles away from every worry. And with butler service always on hand, relaxation is the only plan you'll need.
For arrivals as of February 1, 2025.

SRC.name: Beachfront Honeymoon One-Bedroom Walkout Butler Suite w/ Patio Tranquility Soaking Tub
SRC.description: Situated right on the beach, these Butler Suites are found on the ground floor of the Sandringham building. The suites' spacious patio features a Tranquility Soaking Tub for two with privacy curtains and a bistro dining set making this the ideal spot for alone time together, alfresco meals and reveling in stunning views of the Caribbean Sea and resort's private island. To create a true home away from home, the master bedroom boasts a king-size bed, Smart TV and separate living room complete with a fully stocked wet bar and a second Smart TV. As for the spa-style bathroom, a dual-control, walk-in rain shower, twin vessel sinks, and large backlit mirrors create a lavish space with enough room for two. For the ultimate element of luxury, guests can expect attentive service from a personal butler, 24-hour in-room dining.

To enhance your experience, you'll find his and her sinks accenting a fine marble vanity and our Signature king size, mahogany four-poster bed in your spacious bedroom to ensure a sumptuous sleep. You'll feel like royalty when you are pampered by your very own personal Butler, in this most romantic suite.

BRP.description: Located on the top floor of the resort's Beachfront West Wing, this exceptional Butler Suite grants breathtaking views of the serene sea. As stately as its title, this exceptional escape is the essence of Caribbean sophistication. Enter into an elegant foyer that leads to a spacious living and dining area appointed with a cozy sofa, custom crafted mahogany furnishings, and fully stocked bar. The grand master bedroom features a four-poster, king-size bed with soft Italian linens and plush pillows for the ultimate sleep experience. The en-suite bath is complete with a double vanity, walk-in shower and Roman tub. Outside, the suites' two walkout balconies invite you to relax and take in the vistas on a chaise lounge and bistro set. Butler Elite and 24-hour in-room dining are included.

BRP.name: Grand Duke Oceanfront Butler Suite
BRP.description: Stylishly appointed and located in the East Wing on levels 1, 2 or 3, this striking suite is distinguished by its artful, Island contemporary design. An open-partition plan delineates sleeping quarters from the charming living and intimate dining spaces, where walls of glass sliders frame the magnificent ocean view. Exquisitely detailed decor throughout, including the ultra-luxe signature king size, four-poster bed dressed in fine European linens and the elegantly upholstered, colonial-inspired furnishings. The lavishly outfitted marble bath boasts a Roman soaking tub and separate walk-in shower. A discreet and attentive personal butler, whose impeccable attention to detail leaves nothing to chance, will cater to your needs for the duration of your memorable stay. Outside, a private balcony or patio is furnished for lounging, or dining.

SWH.name: Blue Mahoe Overwater Butler Villa
SWH.description: T66d,These spectacular overwater villas offer an unmatched connection to the Caribbean Sea and deliver complete immersion with fine turquoise waters and rich marine life below. Each villa is also equipped with a smart TV and a large ceiling fan to stay cool while enjoying fresh Caribbean breezes. The spa style bathrooms are equipped with his and hers sinks, a large backlit mirror adorned with mosaic tile, and a walk-in rain shower. Outside, your private patio is equipped with an extended sun deck, outdoor shower, sun loungers, and a bistro set for two. Couples can also admire the beauty of the ocean from their private outdoor Tranquility Soaking Tub for two or overwater hammocks. Inside, glass floor panels and lit water ensure you can enjoy undersea views any time. These villas also boast Butler Elite service, which handles every detail of your vacation with unobtrusive grace, and 24 hour in-room dining to complete your overwater vacation.

SBR.name: South Seas Royal Rondoval Butler Suite w/ Private Pool Sanctuary
SBR.description: Sandals unique Rondoval Suites offer eternally romantic escapes. These exceptional Butler Suites feature a soaring 20-foot conical ceiling, a custom mahogany king-size bed, and a lavish private pool sanctuary-with direct access from the bedroom. The living area impresses with elegant details including a smart television, indoor dining, fully-stocked wet bar and floors made of ivory patika and porcelain planks with pebble and coral stone accents. The bathroom boasts a large soaking tub carved out of solid stone, plus his and hers white quartz vanities with back-lit mirrors. Surrounded by lush foliage, these private villas offer an exotic paradise that brings love full circle. Butler Elite and 24-hour in-room dining included.

A sprawling rooftop for stargazing tucked into the newest section of the resort, our Rondoval Butler Sky Villas are lush getaways within themselves, featuring plenty of indoor and outdoor space to spend your days blissfully unbothered. These modern villas are inspired by Saint Lucia's tropical charms, but that's only part of their appeal. SLU.name: Sunset Oceanview Bluff Millionaire Butler Villa with Private Pool Sanctuary
SLU.description: Chic, secluded and utterly romantic, these Butler Suites rival the most luxurious multi-million dollar island homes. Set 150 feet above sea level atop a picturesque sunset bluff, these villas feature fully retractable glass walls in the master bedroom and living room that open up to 180 degrees unobstructed views of the Caribbean Sea from a three-story sundeck. The private deck boasts complete privacy so you can enjoy the villa's dining area, lounge chairs, and zero-entry plunge pool with waterfall and whirlpool. Inside, these dramatically beautiful suites offer you and the one you love over 1,000 sq. ft. of pure relaxation with modern amenities such as two HD Smart televisions, a king-size bed, fully stocked bar, airy living room, contemporary bathroom with a single vanity, walk-in shower, free-standing tub, and a personal butler. Here, you'll enjoy private al fresco dining, a refreshing swim in your private infinity pool or lazy days sunbathing. Butler Elite and 24-hour in-room dining are included.

SGL.name: Overwater Honeymoon Butler Bungalow
SGL.description: T470,These gorgeous overwater bungalows convey an intimate connection to the Caribbean Sea and deliver complete immersion of the fine turquoise waters and rich marine life below. Glass floor panels and lit water ensure you can enjoy undersea views at any time. Couples can also admire the beauty of the ocean from their private outdoor Tranquility Soaking Tub for two or over-water hammocks. Every bungalow captures the height of luxury with hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings, custom crafted king-size beds adorned with soft linens and plush pillows for the ultimate sleep experience. Inside, each bungalow is also equipped with a smart TV and a large ceiling fan to stay cool while enjoying fresh Caribbean breezes. The bathrooms are equipped with his and hers sinks, a large backlit mirror adorned with mosaic tile, and a walk-in rain shower. Outside, your private patio is also equipped with an extended sun deck, outdoor shower, sun loungers, and a bistro set for two. Butler Elite service, which handles every detail of your vacation with unobtrusive grace, and 24 hour in-room dining are included to complete your over-water vacation. 4f3:{"amenityId":216,"amenityName":"Over-The-Water Bungalow","amenityType":"Room Types","amenityCategory":"Room Types"}

With entry to the patio, the spacious bedroom is complete with a plush king-size bed, HD Smart TV, and a sofa chair. Guests won't have to leave their room for a cocktail with a fully stocked in-room bar with premium liquors and wine. The luxurious bathroom features a walk-in shower with a glass window into the bedroom, a single vanity, and a Red Lane Spa amenity kit. Guests can relax in the living room with a second HD Smart TV, and a guest half bathroom. With elite butler, private check-in, and 24-hour in-room dining, everything is taken care of.

SCR.description: These gorgeous bungalows are arranged in Sandals iconic heart formation around a semi-private pool and lush, man-made island. Every bungalow captures the height of luxury with hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings, custom crafted king-size beds adorned with soft linens and plush pillows for the ultimate sleep experience. Inside, each bungalow is also equipped with a smart TV, a fully stocked wet bar with premium liquor and a large ceiling fan to stay cool while enjoying fresh Caribbean breezes. The bathrooms are equipped with his and hers sinks, a large backlit mirror adorned with mosaic tile, and a walk-in rain shower. Outside, your private patio is also equipped with an extended sun deck, Tranquility Soaking Tub with privacy curtains, sun loungers, and a bistro set for two. The entire experience is rounded out through attentive service from a personal butler and 24-hour in-room dining.
